title: Melodic Ambient Pack
description: 15 unique melodic ambients to use in your game or projects.
longDescription:
15 unique melodic ambient .WAVs to use in your game or projects. These feature a wide range of musical emotion to perfectly suit your needs.

If you wish to sample some, they can be found here: https://soundcloud.com/user-62359772/sets/melodic-ambient-pack.

Here's a breakdown of the ambients:

Ambient 1: Winds Of Change -

A steadily growing series of ambient plucks and percussion followed with a triumphant horn solo.

Ambient 2: Chordic Dreams -

 A somber chorus of organs in space.

Ambient 3: Axe To The Mind - 

A dissonnant swelling and falling piece, surrounded by odd fluctuations.

Ambient 4: Look Who It Is -

A flow of strings and keys growing together in a joyous fashion.

Ambient 5: Tritectra - 

A steady buildup of 3 different instruments in a chaotic, yet happy way.

Ambient 6: Tinted - 

A dedicated sound that seems to fuel something greater.

Ambient 7: Soft Gulf - 

A quiet and uncertain ride through the sea.

Ambient 8: Sawblade Reef -

Beeps and boops hidden underneath a layer of softness.

Ambient 9: Fest Brewings -

Calming tones glide about.

Ambient 10: Shiopeia - 

An air of mystery that builds towards the goal.

Ambient 11: Welder - 

Humming pads lead to melodic and monstrous roars.

Ambient 12: Crystal Quiet - 

An unsettling voyage.

Ambient 13: Depth Charge - 

Ragged and somber growls.

Ambient 14: Uncanny - 

Far off echoes and hisses, telling a ghostly tale.

Ambient 15: Sanity Lost - 

Pure chaos and tuneless saws filling space with dread.
technicalDetails:
Features: Songs to be used for moments that you want to affect the brain, and not just the ears.

Number of Audio Wavs: 15

Number of Audio Cues: 15

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 41.1 minutes

Supported Development Platforms: Any software that takes WAV files.

Supported Target Build Platforms: Anything that takes WAV files.

Documentation: https://www.dropbox.com/s/gowrj9v0t31rjsh/Specs.txt?dl=0

Important/Additional Notes: Enjoy!

Feel free to contact me at gavin.mcavaddy@gmail.com.
